front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Ethernet Amendment 10: Media Access Control Parameters, Physical Layers and Management Parameters for 200 Gb/s and 400 Gb/s Operation
front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2015 adds Clause 116 through Clause 124 and Annex 119A through Annex 120E. This amendment includes IEEE 802.3 Media Access Control (MAC) parameters, Physical Layer specifications, and management parameters for the transfer of IEEE 802.3 format frames at 200 Gb/s and 400 Gb/s.
